title: Mobile Learning Awareness and Sustained Learning Competency Strengthening Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile device proficiency and experience in self-directed learning
context.additional_context: Learners are working professionals or job seekers who prefer flexible mobile learning and aim to strengthen social-sector job competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three effective strategies for utilizing mobile learning tools
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning plans using a learning habit assessment tool
Learners can analyze the impact of mobile learning environments on continuous learning and propose personalized learning strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
